Class SearchIndexLocalServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    at.meduni.liferay.portlet.rdconnect.service.SearchIndexLocalService, com.liferay.portal.kernel.bean.IdentifiableBean, com.liferay.portal.service.BaseLocalService, com.liferay.portal.service.InvokableLocalService, com.liferay.portal.service.PersistedModelLocalService

    public class SearchIndexLocalServiceImpl
extends SearchIndexLocalServiceBaseImpl
    The implementation of the search index local service.

    All custom service methods should be put in this class. Whenever methods are added, rerun ServiceBuilder to copy their definitions into the SearchIndexLocalService interface.

    This is a local service. Methods of this service will not have security checks based on the propagated JAAS credentials because this service can only be accessed from within the same VM.

    Author:
    Robert Reihs
    See Also:
    SearchIndexLocalServiceBaseImpl, SearchIndexLocalServiceUtil
